title: So much weird "minion" block
body:
Getting pinned against the wall by Monsters in the jungle.
Wards, yes WARDS, when you have vision on them can block your movement... WTF (Supports spamming wards when you chase them...)
Thresh Lantern can also block movement now

Intended changes for season 5? or buggy?

replies.body: Thresh lantern blocking movement is not a bug, it was patched mid last season to stop enemies standing on it. Wards has been a bug before (it hurt rammus a lot) and based on what you have said its coming back. Jungle monsters, particularly the chickens look bigger to me, should block movement, but actually getting stuck sounds quite unlucky.

> [{quoted}](name=AussieTurtle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZsGfFrvx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-06T08:19:49.913+0000)
>
> Thresh lantern blocking movement is not a bug, it was patched mid last season to stop enemies standing on it. Wards has been a bug before (it hurt rammus a lot) and based on what you have said its coming back. Jungle monsters, particularly the chickens look bigger to me, should block movement, but actually getting stuck sounds quite unlucky.

If you flash a wall to escape an enemy you can get stuck behind the monsters and you have to kill them to be able to move. something hard to do when you're a support with 100hp

A weird bug I got in a game not too long ago, was minions getting blocked under their own turret. A siege minion and 3 casters in a wave were stuck at their tower, until I came and cleared the siege, then they started moving and attacking as usual.
Also something I noticed since new SR was that minions can randomly change agro and rek your cs.
